examples: The grass is always greener on the other side of the fence.
He lay down on the grass and looked up at the sky.
A grama é sempre mais verde do outro lado da cerca.
Ele deitou-se na grama e olhou para o céu.

suggested: Why did the grasshopper not want to play in the grass? It was too hopper.
The grass always looks greener on the other side, but it's just as hard to mow.
Why is the grass always greener on the other side? Because it's fertilized by all the BS over here.
The grass is always greener on the other side, but have you ever thought about how much pollution is on the other side of the fence?
The smell of freshly cut grass.
The feeling of the soft grass under your feet.
The connection to nature and the earth when you look at a lush green lawn.
